title: When Citi Met AVAX: Banking Giant Taps Avalanche for Tokenization Pilot
description: The tech trial will make the financial titan the second major bank to tinker with AVAX.

title: Stephen Chow, Dwight Howard and 50-year-old whisky NFTs: Nifty Newsletter
description:
NFTs launched by Hong Kong celebrity Stephen Chow recorded $23 million in trading volume, while a whisky distributor is using NFTs to sell a rare collection.

In this week’s newsletter, read about how another hybrid token standard aims to rival ERC-404 and how Hong Kong celebrity Stephen Chow’s nonfungible token (NFT) collection recorded $23 million in trading volume. Find out why athletes need to understand the workings of the NFT space before jumping in, and check out the liquor distributor selling a 50-year-old whisky collection using NFTs and artificial intelligence (AI). In other news, learn how Ordinals could boost Bitcoin miners after the halving.

A week after the launch of ERC-404, an unofficial token standard blending fungible and nonfungible tokens, a developer team claims to have done it better with a “Divisible NFT” standard. Like its rival, the token standard also aims to be a hybrid between ERC-20 and ERC-721.

The proposed standard includes fractionalization, allowing holders to trade fractionalized portions of their NFTs. Pseudonymous developer “Cygaar” claimed that despite ERC-404’s popularity, it’s “inefficient and breaks at certain edge cases.”

Read more

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

A fake app impersonating Curve Finance has appeared on Apple's App Store. Meanwhile, Bitcoin tore through the $1 trillion market cap ceiling as the price eclipsed $50,000, recovering from an earlier pullback that occurred after hotter-than-expected inflation figures were published in the United States, and a roster of new Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) hasn’t cannibalized trading activity on Robinhood, the firm’s chief financial officer said.

Developers behind Curve Finance have warned users of a fake app impersonating the decentralized finance protocol on Apple’s App Store.

The Feb. 14 warning urged users to “Beware of scams,” and that “A fake with our logo was spotted!”

Read more

title: United Kingdom’s CBDC plans progress amid privacy concerns
description: The United Kingdom is pressing forward with its plans to introduce a central bank digital currency (CBDC), despite lingering concerns surrounding privacy implications. title: Peter Thiel’s Investment Fund Bought $200,000,000 Worth of Bitcoin and Ethereum Right Before Bull Run: Report
description:

title: Gary Gensler Says Bitcoin Is ‘Token of Choice for Ransomware’ and ‘Not That Decentralized’
description:
